item.title: gitbook因为nodejs版本不匹配导致安装报错
item.description: 如果nodejs使用的不是10.x版本，就会报错 1Installing GitBook 3.2.3 2/usr/local/lib/node_modules/gitbook-cli/node_modules/npm/node_modules/graceful-fs/polyfills.js:287 3 if (cb) cb.apply(this, arguments) 4 ^ 5 6TypeError: cb.apply is not a function 7 at /usr/local/lib/node_modules/gitbook-cli/node_modules/npm/node_modules/graceful-fs/polyfills.js:287:18 8 at FSReqCallback.oncomplete (fs.js:177:5) 参考： https://www.bilibili.com/read/cv6932054/
